heisig_chinese_memo: Stop spooning turkeys. Date someone more feminine!
heisig_constituent: feminine, Prince, this here, stop, footprint, spoon, sitting on the ground, turkey
heisig_story: This character for female forms a pair with that for male, which we will learn later (Frame 804). The elements: footprint . . . spoon . . . turkey.
myStory:
Ideogrammic compound (會意): 止 (“feet”) + 人 (“person”) – where a person stops; here.

мать птица
koohiiStory2: To become feminine you must stop using a spoon to eat turkey and use a knife and fork like a proper lady.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If you can stop a turkey by putting a spoon in its face you'll know it's a female turkey. A male turkey will peck the spoon out of your hand and run away. But a female turkey will wonder why you're putting a spoon there, stop, and look up at you wondering if you're okay.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture the female turkey stopping when it sees you holding out a spoon. Why are you doing that human? it thinks. Are you sick?
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The female turkey then runs around making a mess (めす) of things trying to figure out what's wrong with you. She kicks around her hay, water bowl, and scratches at your pants, making more mess marks on them. But you don't move and she gets even more worried.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine watching a female turkey make a mess of her own cage because she thinks you need help. How sweet.
Ru_trainchinese: cí: (прил) самка, женская особь (о растениях и животных)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: this (此) little bird (隹) is a female
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Stop spooning turkeys. Date someone more feminine!
humanum_full_description_en:
From "隹", " this " sound. The characters of the Chu family in the Warring States period may be derived from " bird ". " Bird " and "隹" are synonymous symbols. The original meaning is the mother bird. "Said Wen": "Female, bird mother. Congfu, this sound." Such as "Er Ya. "Shu Niao": "If the male and female of the bird cannot be separated, use the right wing to cover the left, the male; the left cover the right, the female." "Shan Hai Jing. "Bei Shan Jing": "There is a bird yan, which looks like a female pheasant, but is colorful with words."

" Female " can generally refer to female animals. Such as "Zhuangzi. "Tian Yun": "Insects, males roar in the upper wind, females should turn to the lower wind." "Yuefu Poetry Collection. Cross-blown tunes five. "Mulan Poem": "Male rabbit's feet are fluttering, female rabbit's eyes are blurred." It also means female. Such as "Pipe. "Ba Xing": "The Chu people attacked the Song Dynasty. Zheng... made him lose her male and female male." Yin Zhizhang's note: "Missed a man and a woman."

" Female " by extension means weakness. Such as "Lao Tzu. Chapter 28: "Knowing his male, guarding his female, is the world stream." "Huainanzi. Yuan Dao: "It is the old saint who keeps the clean road and holds the female festival." Gao Luu's note: "Female, weak." In ancient books, "male and female" are often used as a metaphor for strength and defeat, such as "Historical Records. "Xiang Yu Benji": "I would like to challenge the king of Han to fight the male and female, and not to suffer the people of the world, father and son."

"Orpiment" is a mineral that can be made into pigments and used by the ancients to alter text or paintings. "Mengxi Bi Tan. "Story One": "There are errors in the net edition of Guange's new book, and it is painted with orpiment." The extension indicates a change of the text, such as "The Family Instructions of Yan Family. "Mianxue": "If you have not read all the books in the world, you must not arrogantly write orily." It also refers to arbitrarily changing characters and making arbitrarily arguments, such as "Book of Jin. "Wang Yan Chuan": "Yi Li was disturbed, so he changed it immediately, the world title "Ornithology in the Mouth"."
humanum_short_description_en: From "隹", " this " sound. The original meaning is the mother bird.
humanum_full_description:
從「隹」，「此」聲。戰國楚系文字或從「鳥」。「鳥」和「隹」是義近形符。本義是母鳥。《說文》：「雌，鳥母也。从隹，此聲。」如《爾雅．釋鳥》：「鳥之雌雄不可別者，以翼右掩左，雄；左掩右，雌。」《山海經．北山經》：「有鳥焉，其狀如雌雉，而五彩以文。」

　　「雌」可泛指雌性的動物。如《莊子．天運》：「蟲，雄鳴於上風，雌應於下風而化。」《樂府詩集．橫吹曲辭五．木蘭詩》：「雄兔腳撲朔，雌兔眼迷離。」又表示女性。如《管子．霸形》：「楚人攻宋．鄭……令其人有喪雌雄。」尹知章注：「失男女之偶。」

　　「雌」引申表示柔弱。如《老子．第二十八章》：「知其雄，守其雌，為天下谿。」《淮南子．原道》：「是故聖人守清道而抱雌節。」高誘注：「雌，柔弱也。」古書裡常以「雌雄」比喻強弱、勝負，如《史記．項羽本紀》：「願與漢王挑戰決雌雄，毋徒苦天下之民父子為也。」

　　「雌黃」是礦物，可製成顏料，古人用來塗改文字或畫作。《夢溪筆談．故事一》：「館閣新書淨本有誤書處，以雌黃塗之。」引申表示更改文字，如《顏氏家訓．勉學》：「觀天下書未徧，不得妄下雌黃。」又指亂改文字、妄下議論，如《晉書．王衍傳》：「義理有所不安，隨即改更，世號『口中雌黃』。」

雌(めす): female (animal)

從「 隹 」，「 此 」聲。戰國楚系文字或從「 鳥 」。「 鳥 」和「 隹 」是義近形符。本義是母鳥。《說文》：「雌，鳥母也。从隹，此聲。」如《爾雅．釋鳥》：「鳥之雌雄不可別者，以翼右掩左，雄；左掩右，雌。」《山海經．北山經》：「有鳥焉，其狀如雌雉，而五彩以文。」 「 雌 」可泛指雌性的動物。如《莊子．天運》：「蟲，雄鳴於上風，雌應於下風而化。」《樂府詩集．橫吹曲辭五．木蘭詩》：「雄兔腳撲朔，雌兔眼迷離。」又表示女性。如《管子．霸形》：「楚人攻宋．鄭……令其人有喪雌雄。」尹知章注：「失男女之偶。」 「 雌 」引申表示柔弱。如《老子．第二十八章》：「知其雄，守其雌，為天下谿。」《淮南子．原道》：「是故聖人守清道而抱雌節。」高誘注：「雌，柔弱也。」古書裡常以「雌雄」比喻強弱、勝負，如《史記．項羽本紀》：「願與漢王挑戰決雌雄，毋徒苦天下之民父子為也。」 「雌黃」是礦物，可製成顏料，古人用來塗改文字或畫作。《夢溪筆談．故事一》：「館閣新書淨本有誤書處，以雌黃塗之。」引申表示更改文字，如《顏氏家訓．勉學》：「觀天下書未徧，不得妄下雌黃。」又指亂改文字、妄下議論，如《晉書．王衍傳》：「義理有所不安，隨即改更，世號『口中雌黃』。」
From " 隹", " this" sound. The characters of the Chu family in the Warring States period may be derived from " bird". " Bird" and " 隹" are synonymous symbols. The original meaning is the mother bird. "Said Wen": "Female, bird mother. Congfu, this sound." Such as "Er Ya. "Shu Niao": "If the male and female of the bird cannot be separated, use the right wing to cover the left, the male; the left cover the right, the female." "Shan Hai Jing. "Bei Shan Jing": "There is a bird yan, which looks like a female pheasant, but is colorful with words." " Female" can generally refer to female animals. Such as "Zhuangzi. "Tian Yun": "Insects, males roar in the upper wind, females should turn to the lower wind." "Yuefu Poetry Collection. Cross-blown tunes five. "Mulan Poem": "Male rabbit's feet are fluttering, female rabbit's eyes are blurred." It also means female. Such as "Pipe. "Ba Xing": "The Chu people attacked the Song Dynasty. Zheng... made him lose her male and female male." Yin Zhizhang's note: "Missed a man and a woman." " Female" by extension means weakness. Such as "Lao Tzu. Chapter 28: "Knowing his male, guarding his female, is the world stream." "Huainanzi. Yuan Dao: "It is the old saint who keeps the clean road and holds the female festival." Gao Luu's note: "Female, weak." In ancient books, "male and female" are often used as a metaphor for strength and defeat, such as "Historical Records. "Xiang Yu Benji": "I would like to challenge the king of Han to fight the male and female, and not to suffer the people of the world, father and son." "Orpiment" is a mineral that can be made into pigments and used by the ancients to alter text or paintings. "Mengxi Bi Tan. "Story One": "There are errors in the net edition of Guange's new book, and it is painted with orpiment." The extension indicates a change of the text, such as "The Family Instructions of Yan Family. "Mianxue": "If you have not read all the books in the world, you must not arrogantly write orily." It also refers to arbitrarily changing characters and making arbitrarily arguments, such as "Book of Jin. "Wang Yan Chuan": "Yi Li was disturbed, so he changed it immediately, the world title "Ornithology in the Mouth"."

雌字的基本解释

雌
cí
母的，阴性的，与“雄”相对：雌性。雌花。雌雄。
〔雌黄〕矿物，橙黄色，可做颜料，古时用来涂改文字，如“信口雌雌”（随意讥评）。
柔羽。
trigamous雄

雌字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cí］
［《廣韻》此移切，平支，清。］
(1)禽鸟中能产卵的。
(2)泛指能产卵细胞的（生物）。
(3)指女性或女子。明徐渭有《雌木蘭替父從軍》杂剧。
(4)指视为女性。
(5)柔弱；柔细。
(6)指视为柔弱；轻视。
(7)败，屈伏。
(8)不承认错误、罪责。
(9)挨，赖着不动。
(10)犹言死皮赖脸。
(11)偷，勾引。
(12)用同“齜”。（嘴）张开；（牙齿）露出。
(13)用同“呲”。吹。
(14)用同“泚”。淌；喷涌。
(15)用同“叱”。参见“雌答”。

◎ 雌
trigamous

雌字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【隹字部】　雌； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1366第11
〔古文〕䧳【唐韻】七移切【集韻】【韻會】七支切，?音姕。【說文】鳥母也。从隹从此。【詩·小雅】誰知烏之雌雄。　又【廣韻】牝也。【詩·小雅】以雌以雄。【史記·司馬相如·上林賦·素雌註】索隱曰：素雌，猿之雌者。餘詳雄字註。　又【集韻】【正韻】?千西切，音妻。【集韻】牝也。【莊子·齊物論】猿猵狚以爲雌。

雌字的起名意思

暂无。

female
Basic explanation of words
female
cí
Female, feminine, as opposed to "male": female. female flower. male and female.
[Orpiment] mineral, orange-yellow, can be used as pigments, used in ancient times to alter words, such as "spoken women" (feel free to comment).
Soft feather.
trigamous male
female
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cí］
["Guangyun" This shift cut, flat branch, clear. ]
(1) Those that can lay eggs in birds.
(2) Generally refers to (biological) that can lay eggs.
(3) Refers to women or women. In the Ming Dynasty, Xu Wei had a miscellaneous drama "Female Mulan Joining the Army for Father".
(4) Refers to being regarded as female.
(5) Weak; soft and thin.
(6) Refers to being considered weak; contemptuous.
(7) Defeat, bend.
(8) Do not admit mistakes and guilt.
(9) Ending, staying still.
(10) He still said that he was dead skinned.
(11) Steal, seduce.
(12) Use the same as "龇". (Mouth) is open; (teeth) are exposed.
(13) Use the same as "呲". blow.
(14) Use the same as "Yang". Dripping; spewing.
(15) Use the same as "叱". See "female answer".
female

female

【戌集】【隹字部】　女; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1366 No. 11
[Ancient text] Ha [Tang Yun] seven shift cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] seven branches cut,? Yin Si. [Said the text] Bird mother also. From then on. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Who knows the male and female of crow.　[Guang Yun] Yan Ye. [Poetry·Xiaoya] Male to female. [Historical Records·Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu·Su-female Note】Suoyin said: Suo-female, female of ape. Yu Xiangxiong word note.　[Jiyun] [Zhengyun]? Qianxiqie, wife of sound. [Ji Yun] Su Ye. [Zhuangzi·Qiwu Theory] Yuan Yungao thinks that she is female.

Name meaning

雌
形声字。佳表意,古文字形体像鸟,表示母鸟;此(cf)表声,此本指停止处有止息意,母鸟产卵、孵卵、育雏,止息巢中
的时间比公鸟多。本义是母鸟,泛指其他母性的动物。
母的、阴性的,跟“雄”相对:~兔|~蕊。
~蜂 ~凤 ~伏 ~花~黄 ~声 ~性 ~雄
cí
妄下~黄 信口~黃 一决~雄
雌
雌
隶
женский
Пиктофонетические символы.
Хороший знак означает, что древние иероглифы напоминают птицу, что означает птицу-мать; это (ср) выражает звук, это относится к точке остановки. Птица-мать откладывается, вылупляется и выводит потомство, а время в гнезде стоп больше, чем у самца.
Первоначальное значение - «мать-птица», которое относится к другим материнским животным в целом.
Женское и женское начало, в отличие от «самца»: ~ Кролик | ~ Руи.
~ Пчела ~ Феникс ~ Фу ~ Цветок ~ Желтый ~ Звук ~ Пол ~ Самец
Вдруг ~ Хуан Синкоу ~ Хуан Ицзюэ ~ Сюн
женский
женский
писец
cí
самка
雌雄 самка и самец
Radicals: 止, 匕, 隹  (stop, spoon, turkey)
Meaning Mnemonic
If you can stop a turkey by putting a spoon in its face you'll know it's a female turkey. A male turkey will peck the spoon out of your hand and run away. But a female turkey will wonder why you're putting a spoon there, stop, and look up at you wondering if you're okay.
Picture the female turkey stopping when it sees you holding out a spoon. Why are you doing that human? it thinks. Are you sick?
Reading Mnemonic
The female turkey then runs around making a mess (めす) of things trying to figure out what's wrong with you. She kicks around her hay, water bowl, and scratches at your pants, making more mess marks on them. But you don't move and she gets even more worried.
Imagine watching a female turkey make a mess of her own cage because she thinks you need help. How sweet.
